attributes.action: sack the social workers and strike off the paediatrician who failed baby P.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I can't understand why the people who did nothing for baby P have not resigned in shame. I beg the prime minister to sack Shoesmith, Ward, Christou Al Zayyat and also to charge them with child neglect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
